header_description: An assessment to understand your levels of Depression, Anxiety, and Stress. Please answer honestly based on how you have felt over the past week.
recommendation_mild_moderate: It is recommended to get closer to Allah SWT (increase worship), practice relaxation techniques such as meditation, deep breathing, or light exercise. Consulting with friends or family can also help.
recommendation_severe_very_severe: It is advisable to consult a mental health professional such as a psychologist or psychiatrist for further treatment and pray to Allah SWT.
results_description: Here is an analysis of your responses.
question_1: I find it difficult to feel happy about anything.
question_2: I feel hopeless about the future.
question_3: I feel unable to enjoy anything.
question_5: I feel that I am worthless.
question_6: I feel no motivation to do anything.
question_8: I find it difficult to breathe (e.g., feeling short of breath).
question_9: I feel muscle tension, cramps, or headaches.
question_10: I feel anxious for no clear reason.
question_12: I feel unable to control my worries.
question_13: I feel easily startled or restless.
question_14: I feel afraid that something bad will happen.
question_15: I find it difficult to relax.
question_16: I feel easily irritable or annoyed.
question_18: I find it difficult to focus on anything.
question_19: I find it difficult to cope with minor disturbances.
